author: Fabio Lucas Carvalho
title: Meet the Indian electric mini tractor - 15 HP power, designed for small and medium-sized farms
text:
India's new electric mini tractor offers 15 HP of power and efficiency for small and medium farmers. Discover its advantages.
Modern agriculture faces increasing challenges related to efficiency, sustainability and cost reduction. In this scenario, the Sukoon Haldhar Micro Trac 750, a mini electric tractor innovative with power equivalent to 15 HP, which could be a revolutionary solution for small and medium-sized farms.
Designed to offer high performance, low operating costs and reduced environmental impact, this compact equipment effectively meets the needs of the modern farmer.
Sustainable technology for agriculture and industry
O Haldhar MUT-eV (Multi-Utility Traction EV) is a multifunctional solution designed to address the challenges of agriculture and industry with a sustainable approach.

Equipped with advanced electrical technology, the electric mini tractor drastically reduces dependence on fossil fuels, contributing to the reduction of carbon emissions and promoting more responsible environmental practices.
Power and autonomy for everyday life
With a 9,6 kW battery, the Haldhar MUT-eV offers enough power to operate a variety of agricultural implements.
Its autonomy varies between 4 to 6 hours per charge, meeting the main daily demands of small and medium-sized farms.
Additionally, compatibility with fast chargers and systems of solar charging allows operations in remote regions, providing greater flexibility to rural producers.
Compact and functional design
With dimensions of 1.981 mm long, 938 mm wide and 1.193 mm high, the Haldhar MUT-eV is compact enough to maneuver in tight spaces such as uneven terrain and dense crops.
Your weight 490kg and ability to 300 kg lift make it a versatile tool for tasks such as plowing, planting and transporting materials.
Environmental and economic benefits
The main benefits of Haldhar MUT-eV include:
- Zero emission of polluting gases, contributing to a cleaner environment.
- Silent operation, minimizing the noise impact on rural activities.
- Reduction of operating costs by up to 50% in five years, due to the absence of fuel and reduced need for maintenance.
According to studies by the FAO (Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations), the transition to electric agricultural equipment can reduce carbon emissions in agriculture by up to 40%.
Technical specifications
The Haldhar MUT-eV boasts impressive technical specifications, including:
- Maximum speed: 15 km/h
- Ground clearance: 28 cm
- Battery: 160 Ah lead-acid, with expansion option
- Charging Time: 4 to 5 hours with standard plug
- Tires: Front (4,00 x 10) and rear (6,00 x 12)
- Motor voltage: 48V
Compatibility and other details of the mini tractor
Another distinguishing feature of the Haldhar MUT-eV is its compatibility with a variety of implements, such as rotavators, plows and trailers, maximizing its usefulness in different tasks. With the capacity to replace diesel tractors of up to 15 HP, it offers an effective and affordable solution for small farmers.
Designed to withstand harsh conditions, the Haldhar MUT-eV features sealed components that protect against dust, moisture and extreme temperature variations. In addition, it features 2 year warranty on the motor and 3 year warranty on the battery, providing security and confidence to producers.
Integration with systems solar charging enables farmers to adopt a more autonomous and environmentally friendly approach. This is in line with the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), which encourage the adoption of clean and efficient technologies in the agricultural sector.
Future perspectives
The growing demand for sustainable solutions in agriculture suggests that the Haldhar MUT-eV will play a key role in the future of the sector. Advances in energy storage and fast charging are expected to further increase its efficiency and adoption by farmers.
The Sukoon Haldhar Micro Trac 750 is an innovative solution that combines efficiency, economy and sustainability.
With its advanced technology, compact design and attractive cost-benefit, it represents an excellent alternative for producers looking to modernize their operations in an environmentally responsible way.
For more information on how to purchase the Haldhar MUT-eV and transform your farming operations, contact authorized distributors or visit the manufacturer’s official website.
With information Sukoon.
